forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
